須.definition: must; to have to; to wait

須彌.definition: Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition; Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues

須彌山.definition: Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition; Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues

須知.definition: key information; instructions; it must be borne in mind

須臾.definition: in a flash; in a jiffy
